statements: SELECT * FROM Plants
SELECT plant_id, plant_name FROM Plants WHERE plant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
SELECT plant_name, watering_schedule FROM Plants WHERE watering_schedule IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM Plants ORDER BY plant_name ASC
SELECT plant_id, irrigation_schedule FROM Plants WHERE irrigation_schedule = 'daily'
SELECT * FROM Plants WHERE plant_id = '5a58325b-e541-4d89-9830-9b0f7bc124f2';
SELECT plant_name, watering_schedule FROM Plants WHERE plant_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Plants WHERE irrigation_schedule IS NOT NULL ORDER BY plant_name DESC;
SELECT plant_id, COUNT(*) AS total_plants FROM Plants GROUP BY plant_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT plant_name FROM Plants WHERE watering_schedule = 'daily' ORDER BY plant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Plant WHERE plant_type ='Flower';
SELECT plant_name, plant_type FROM Plant WHERE watering_interval > 2;
SELECT plant_name, irrigation_duration FROM Plant ORDER BY plant_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Plant;
SELECT task_name, task_date FROM Task WHERE plant_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Plant WHERE plant_type='Fern' ORDER BY plant_name DESC;
SELECT plant_name, watering_interval FROM Plant WHERE irrigation_duration > 10;
SELECT task_name, task_description, task_date FROM Task WHERE plant_id = 3 ORDER BY task_date ASC;
SELECT plant_name, watering_interval, irrigation_duration FROM Plant WHERE watering_interval < 7 AND plant_type='Rose';
SELECT * FROM Plant JOIN Task ON Plant.plant_id = Task.plant_id WHERE plant_type='Cactus';
SELECT * FROM Plant;
SELECT plant_name, water_needs FROM Plant ORDER BY water_needs DESC;
SELECT task_date, task_type FROM WateringTask WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM IrrigationSchedule WHERE water_quantity > 5;
SELECT plant_name, SUM(water_quantity) AS total_water FROM Plant JOIN IrrigationSchedule ON Plant.plant_id = IrrigationSchedule.plant_id GROUP BY plant_name;
SELECT * FROM Plant ORDER BY plant_name DESC, plant_id ASC;
SELECT plant_name, plant_type FROM Plant WHERE water_needs > 5;
SELECT task_id, task_date, task_type FROM WateringTask WHERE completed = false ORDER BY task_date ASC;
SELECT Plant.plant_name, WateringTask.task_date FROM Plant INNER JOIN WateringTask ON Plant.plant_id = WateringTask.plant_id;
SELECT * FROM IrrigationSchedule WHERE water_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Plant
SELECT PlantName, PlantType FROM Plant WHERE PlantType = 'Fruit'
SELECT PlantName, Quantity FROM Plant WHERE Quantity > 10 ORDER BY Quantity DESC
SELECT DISTINCT PlantType FROM Plant
SELECT SUM(Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM Plant
SELECT * FROM Plant ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, name, price FROM Plant WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name
SELECT id, description FROM Plant WHERE price BETWEEN 30 AND 80
SELECT * FROM Plant WHERE id = 3 OR id = 5 OR id = 7
SELECT DISTINCT name FROM Plant
SELECT * FROM Plant;
SELECT id, name, watering_schedule FROM Plant WHERE light_exposure = 'Full Sun';
SELECT name, light_exposure FROM Plant WHERE watering_schedule = 'Twice a week' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, watering_schedule FROM Plant WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM PlantNeeds WHERE water_need > 5 ORDER BY light_need ASC;
SELECT id, name, watering_schedule, light_exposure FROM Plant ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM WateringTask WHERE amount_watered > 5.0;

SELECT p.name, wt.date, wt.amount_watered, pi.irrigation_type FROM Plant p JOIN WateringTask wt ON p.id = wt.plant_id JOIN IrrigationTask it ON p.id = it.plant_id JOIN PlantNeeds pn ON p.id = pn.plant_id JOIN GardenLocation gl ON p.id = gl.location_id WHERE pn.water_need > 2.0 AND gl.latitude < 40.0;
SELECT DISTINCT p.name, pn.water_need, pn.light_need, pn.nutrient_need FROM Plant p JOIN PlantNeeds pn ON p.id = pn.plant_id WHERE pn.nutrient_need = 1.5;
SELECT MAX(duration_minutes) AS max_duration FROM IrrigationTask WHERE irrigation_type = 'drip';
